text: Explore the Era of the First Flame-Chase Journey

title: Mission Description
content: People say this is a cruel era stained with golden blood and crimson, an era of catastrophe where tsunamis rage and mountains crumble, an era of tyranny where corrupt rulers trample the law, a dark era where both gods and their faithful are slaughtered. This is the era of the First Flame-Chase Journey, an era with a scorching sun that burns with blinding light.And you must gaze directly into it, asking it to illuminate the fire you seek.

text: Observe the incident at the Sanctum of Prophecy
(Talk to Labienus and Seneca again, optional)
(Talk to Verginia and Apollonius again, optional)

title: Step Description
content: The myth has drifted from its destined course. If fate is written in the stars, then their gravity pulls not just the sun, but the very tides at your feet.The stars may be untouchable, but the tide isn't. Stand in its flow and feel how cosmic forces lap at your ankles.That's the ocean whispering its worries, wave by wave, shore to soul.

text: Take a stroll around Marmoreal Palace with Cyrene
Continue exploring the Marmoreal Palace with Cyrene
Find a quiet place to "relax" with Cyrene
Go with Cyrene to prepare for tomorrow's banquet

title: Step Description
content: What a spectacle this banquet of power is, where the ruler's ambitious toast leaves everyone intoxicated with possibility. Beneath the sweet honey brew, though, salt and bitterness linger on the tongue.The higher the revelry soars, the less anyone notices the world below. That's the trick of it all.Only those who reach the absolute summit feel the sobering winds of truth. Then comes the inevitable fall. Salt, bitterness, vertigo, pain... all rushing up to embrace you as gravity collects its debt.
